reviews.text: Love the decor and ambiance. The service was very good. We had the four course menu and horse meat main course. First time eating horse meat. It tasted like... beef. The four course menu was very worth the price.

Our favourite place that we tried in Reykjavik, food was reasonably priced, especially considering how good everything was. The waitress was very kind and friendly, we really wanted to meet locals and she entertained a small chat with us, which we really enjoyed. Onto the main event, the food: oh wow! We loved the duck breast starter, some flavours I would have never thought to put together but they worked soooo well! Definitely not a dish I would be able to recreate, which is exactly what left me wanting more and is going to make me go back to Iceland for it. We loved the wolf fish as well as the fish of the day (which was cod). Everything blended together beautifully, flavours were top notch. If that place was in the UK, I'd return every week. In terms of value per money, this was the most affordable dinner that we had in Reykjavik, and the price:quality ratio was unmatched! Highly recommend. Also this was the one place where we noticed the most diversity in staff, which we liked!

Having dinner twice with a family of five. There is a bar and a restaurant on separate premises with common kitchen and team. Excellent kitchen & good choice of beers (wine) and digestives. Very good service. Reservation is recommended.
By far the best meal I had while in Reykjovik. Fantastic set course menus and the service was exceptional.

From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm and friendly atmosphere. The food was absolutely delicious, with each dish bursting with flavor and creativity. What really stood out to me was the unpretentious and laid-back vibe of the place – it felt effortlessly cool and trendy. The service was attentive without being overbearing, adding to the overall enjoyable dining experience. If you're looking for a spot that offers great food, friendly service, and a relaxed ambiance, this place comes highly recommended. It's a true hidden gem that deserves to be discovered by food lovers everywhere.
